div.div: Chapter . Submap title comes from here
What is this document? Learn all about your manual.

The Coffee and Tea Machine has a clock which you can use to schedule that perfect cup of coffee or tea.
Set the time before brewing your first coffee or making your first tea.
This is for the admin.
Add coffee beans to the grinder

are simply added to the grinder by lifting the grinder cover and pouring in the beans. The coffee grinder
Ultracool 7000 must be at least 10% full to work properly. Add
coffee beans to the
Ultracool 7000 grinder every morning.
The water filter purifies the tap water before brewing the coffee or making the tea.
The built-in tea filter must be changed every six months.
The built-in tea filter must be changed every twelve months.
This glossary explains the key terms including abbreviations and acronyms.

div.p: What is this document? Learn all about your manual.
This manual provides you information about the Ultracool 7000.
Read the manual carefully and save it for further use as the expected life of Ultracool 7000 is very long.
Always make new users of Ultracool 7000 read the manual.
The product is built on Linux.
The product does not support server versions.
The Coffee and Tea Machine has a clock which you can use to schedule that perfect cup of coffee or tea. Set the time before brewing your first coffee or making your first tea.This is for the admin.
div.section:
Before setting the time, check the exact time from the Atomic Clock. You can also call technical support. You're great, thanks!
This product can only be serviced by qualified professionals.
Setting the time is the first thing you do when you start with your Coffee and Tea Machine.

span.span: Press the Time button three times.

li.div:
This is common for all audiences. The button beeps once.The colour turns green.
The button beeps once.
The colour turns green.Tässä on tekstiä.

li.span: Press and hold the Arrow Up or Arrow Down button to change the hours and the minutes.

tr.td: Time of the day: whole hours.
Time of the day: minutes of the hour.

li.span: Press the OK button to save the time and exit.
li.div: If the software doesn't exit, press the power key.

div.section: If the user is not added, redo the steps.
Next, add another user or save the procedure in the log book.

h2.span: Add coffee beans to the grinder

div.p: coffee bean are simply added to the grinder by lifting the grinder cover and pouring in the beans. The coffee grinder Ultracool 7000 must be at least 10% full to work properly. Add coffee beans to the Ultracool 7000 grinder every morning.

section.p: Here is information about the task.
This product can only be serviced by qualified professionals.

li.span: Press Shut down to switch off the Ultracool 7000 Coffee and Tea Machine.
Turn the grinder lock switch left until the Ultracool 7000 display shows Open.

li.div: When the grinder has enough beans, the display shows Full.

div.p: The water filter purifies the tap water before brewing the coffee or making the tea.
div.section:
We added some context for experts.
Troubleshooting: Do something.

li.span: Remove the filter from its packaging.

div.div: Important: Watch out for slippery roads.

li.span: Pull the filter compartment towards you.
Place the filter to the compartment carefully.
Push the filter compartment away from you.

p.span: The built-in tea filter must be changed every six months.
The built-in tea filter must be changed every twelve months.

section.p: Local safety regulations must be observed. Only technically qualified and appropriately trained personnel are authorised to open and maintain the units.

div.section: You must buy tea filters from the shop before starting the process.They will be in a sales box.

li.div: Use the wriggly tool for this procedure.

li.span: Open the package in which the filters are.

article.div: Sales box is the package in which you receive your Ultracool 7000. It is hand-made with recyclable wood. A unique number has been carved to its side.
